sentences.en: ‘Running away?’ he mocked.
sentences.cn: “想逃跑？”他取笑道。

sentences.en: " Dost thou mock me now?'said the minister.
sentences.cn: “ 你在拿我开心 吗 ? ” 牧师说.

sentences.en: " I beg your pardon,'said Rhett with mock humility.
sentences.cn: " 请原谅, "瑞德用假意谦卑的口吻说.

sentences.en: "It's tragic!" swoons Jeffrey in mock horror.
sentences.cn: “真惨啊！”杰弗里假装吓昏了过去。

sentences.en: "Oh, I despair sometimes," he says in mock sorrow.
sentences.cn: “啊，我有时会感到绝望，”他假装悲伤地说。

sentences.en: He screwed his face into an expression of mock pain.
sentences.cn: 他面部扭曲，假装疼痛。

sentences.en: He touched his forelock in mock deference.
sentences.cn: 他手触额发假装尊敬。

sentences.en: He went to church only to mock.
sentences.cn: 他去教堂只想嘲笑宗教.

sentences.en: I’m revising for my mocks.
sentences.cn: 我在复习准备模拟考试。

sentences.en: If I would speak, she would mock me into the air.
sentences.cn: 如果我去说的话, 她会把我讥笑得无地自容.

sentences.en: It is a mark of depravity to make a mock of good advice and kind rebuke.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑别人的忠告和善意指责是堕落的标志.

sentences.en: It’s easy for you to mock, but we put a lot of work into this play.
sentences.cn: 你讲风凉话是很轻松，但我们这出戏可是费了很大力气的。

sentences.en: Mock not a cobbler for his black thumbs.

sentences.en: Opposition MPs mocked the government’s decision.
sentences.cn: 反对党议员讥笑政府的这一决策。

sentences.en: She wagged her finger with mock severity.
sentences.cn: 她故作严厉地摆了摆手指.

sentences.en: stop making a mock of other people's business.
sentences.cn: 别嘲笑他人的事了。

sentences.en: The little witch put a mock malignity into her beautiful eyes, and Joseph, trembling with sincere horror, hurried out praying and ejaculating " wicked " as he went.
sentences.cn: 这个小女巫那双美丽的眼睛里添上一种嘲弄的恶毒神气. 约瑟夫真的吓得直抖, 赶紧跑出去,一边跑一边祷告,还嚷着 “ 恶毒! ”

sentences.en: The make-up woman daubed mock blood on Jeremy.
sentences.cn: 那名女化妆师往杰里米的脸上涂抹假血。

sentences.en: Those who mock history will be mocked by history.
sentences.cn: 嘲弄历史的人必将被历史所嘲弄.

sentences.en: You shouldn't mock at other people's religious beliefs.
sentences.cn: 你不应该嘲笑别人的信仰.
